description: The .crypt15 file format is associated with WhatsAppâ€™s encrypted backup files stored on Google Drive or local storage. It is part of the WhatsApp Crypt series (e.g., .crypt14, .crypt12, etc.), which encrypts chat backups for security.

instructions:
To open or decrypt .crypt15 files, you need:

A backup file (msgstore.db.crypt15).The decryption key (from internal storage).A decryption tool like WhatsApp Viewer or custom scripts that use the key.
If you have the decryption key:Use third-party tools like WhatsApp Viewer (for older versions).Use a Python script (if you understand cryptography and Android forensics).
